https://tmrev.io/movie/1036409-Andrea Bocelli: Live at the iTunes Festival 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The operatic tenor performed some of his best music including 'Time To Say Goodbye', 'Nessun dorma', and 'Amazing Grace', live at The Roundhouse in Camden, London. He was supported by soprano Laura Wright and guitar duo CARisMA. Andrea Bocelli: Live at the iTunes Festival
